on reading compounds: 座敷【ザシキ】tatami room, tatami mat room, formal Japanese room, dinner party in a tatami room (esp. when a geisha or maiko attends)
座禅【ザゼン】zazen (seated Zen meditation, usu. in a cross-legged position)
連座【レンザ】implication (in a crime), involvement, sitting in a row (in the same seat)
胡座【アグラ】sitting cross-legged (i.e. Indian style)
kun reading compounds: 座る【すわる】to sit, to squat, to assume (a position), to hold steady, to hold still
